319763.「夜が明けたばっかりの時は\n ゆっくり見る余裕が なかったけど\n メネト村っ:
I didn't have time to look around when the sun
was just up, but I found Menet Village to be a
very peaceful place.

319764.「長い夜が明け ようやく太陽が昇ったのだ。\n 今年のコッケン祭りは\n 盛大に:
After a long night, the sun has finally risen.
This year's Cocken Festival must be celebrated
in a big way!

319765.「そのためにも 急ぎ準備を進めてくれ。\n 皆の者 頼んだぞい！:
For that reason, please hurry up and get
ready. All of you, I'm counting on you!

319766.「あっ！ <pc>さんたち！\n 来てくれたんだね！:
Ah! <pc> and the others! You came,
didn't you?

319767.「こんにちは ティセちゃん！\n 近いうち お祭りでもあるの？\n 村のみんなが:
Hello Tise! Are you having a festival soon? It
looks like everyone in the village is kind of
busy.

319768.「うん！ メネト村では 種まきの時期になると\n 太陽への感謝と 豊穣を願って\:
Yes! In Menet Village, we hold a Cocken
Festival to give thanks to the sun and to wish
for a good harvest at the time of sowing.

319769.「コッケン様っていうのは 村に古くから伝わる\n ニワトリの神様で 太陽のお使い:
Cocken-sama is the old village god of chicken
and the messenger of the sun. So we honor him
and pray for a good harvest.

319770.「やっと太陽が昇ったし ロナ長老は\n 今年は盛大にやるぞって 張り切ってるみた:
The sun has finally come up and Elder Rona
seems to be excited about making it a big deal
this year.

319771.「私ね 眠っていた時に トープスと一緒に\n コッケン祭りに 行くって約束したん:
I promised Tohpes that I would go to the Cocken Festival with him when I was sleeping. If I don't do this, I won't be able to make
it...

319772.「あれからずっと トープスを捜してるんだけど\n この村の周辺には いないみたい:
I've been looking for Tohpes ever since, but I
can't seem to find him around this village.
But I can't search far enough on my own...

319773.「<pc>さんたちは 見ていない？\n きっと <pc>さんたちは ゼニアスの\:
Have <pc> and the others not seen
them? I bet <pc> and the others go
to various places in Zeniath, don't they?

319774.「ううん……。\n あたしたちも トーくんを 見ていないの。\n 今日来たのは:
No... We haven't seen Toh either. We came here
today for another reason.

319775.<pc>は ティセに\nメネト村の 守護天使を\n捜しにきたのだと 説明した。:
<pc> explained to Tise that he had
come looking for a protection angel in Menet
Village.

319776.「この村のみんなが 眠っていた時でも\n なぜか トーくんだけ 目覚めていたし\:
Even when everyone in this village was asleep,
somehow only Toh was awake, and he had a
mysterious Dream Censer.

319777.「きっと トーくんこそがこの村の\n 守護天使を見つけるカギだと 思うんだ。:
I think Toh is the key to find the protection
angel of this village.

319778.「それに あれからずっと 消えたトーくんのこと\n 心配だった。このまま 放って:
Besides, I've been worried about Toh ever
since he disappeared. I can't just leave him
like this, I have to find him!

319779.「ずっと……考えていたんだけど……\n みんな 宵と暁の伝承を 覚えているかい？:
I've been... thinking... do you guys remember
the Evening and Dawn lore? There was this
passage in there.

319780.「まれびと みんなの ねむりをみはる。 \n おやまのしんでん まもりのとりで。:
Marebito (Marebito): Watching over everyone's
sleep. The Shin Den Mamoru no Toride. They
will take an alarm and sleep with you.

319781.「……この伝承のまれびと というのは\n 守護天使のことじゃないかと 思うんだ。:
...I suspect that the rare creatures of this
tradition are protection angels. If so, the
protection angel might be at the temple.

319782.「あれ？ いま 宵と暁の伝承って言ったよね？\n 私の知ってる宵と暁の伝承と 違:
Huh? Did you just say "the lore of Evening and
Dawn"? That's different from what I know about
the lore of Evening and Dawn. What I know...

319783.「まれびと おそらに まほうをかけた。\n たいようのぼって おひさまさんさん。:
Marebito (a rare creature): He cast a spell
over the sky. The sun rose and the sun went
down. The flowers made everyone happy.

319784.「まれびと こんどは ニワトリよんだ。\n ニワトリなくと みんなは げんき。\:
Rarely does one get to see a chicken, but this time it's a chicken, and everyone is happy. The sun is shining, and the festival is about
to begin.

319785.「まれびと みんなと まつりをいわう。\n おどりをおどって たのしいきぶん。\:
Let's have a festival with all the people.
Dance and have fun. Oyasama no shinden: return
to sleep.

319786.「ニワトリねむれば たいようしずむ。\n つきよになれば みんなも ねむる。\n:
If chicken sleeps, the Taiyo Shizumu will calm down. When the sun comes up, everyone will also fall asleep. Happiness continues in the
dream.

319787.「ああ？ どういうことだ？\n オレたちが聞いてた 宵と暁の伝承と\n 全然ちが:
Yeah? - Yeah. What's going on? This is totally
different from what we've heard about the lore
of Yoi and Dawn.

319788.「そんな馬鹿な！ 僕たちは 伝承について\n 記された本を ロナ長老から預かって:
That's absurd! We have a book of lore from
Elder Rona. If you read it...

319789.「本の内容が……変わってる……。\n いったい 何が起きているんだ……？:
The book...has changed... What on earth is
happening...?

319790.「と とりあえず……<pc>も\n 内容を 確認したいだろうから \n この本は:
And anyway...<pc> will want to check
the contents too, so I'll return this book to
you.

319791.<pc>は\n宵と暁の伝承の本（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！ <me_60:
<pc> received Legend of Dusk and Dawn
(Key Item)!<me_60>

319792.「ティセさんの教えてくれた 宵と暁の伝承でも\n まれびとは 神殿に戻ると言って:
I think I should go to Temple of Twilight for the time being, since Tise-san told me that the legend of Evening and Dawn says that the
people will return to the temple.

319794.「あっ……でも ごめん！\n 行くのは 明日にしてもいいかな。: Oh...but I'm sorry! Can we go tomorrow?

319795.「ママはいつも 村の外は危険だっていうの。\n だから <pc>さんたちと一緒な:
Mom always says it's dangerous outside the
village. I'll convince her tonight that we'll
be fine with <pc> and the others!

319796.「うん！ 一緒に行こ！\n 友達のピンチは 放っておけないよね！:
Yeah! Let's go together! You can't leave your
friends in a pinch, can you?

319797.「んじゃ 決まりだな。\n さっさと 宿屋でひと眠りしようぜ。:
Well then, it's decided. Let's get to inn and
have a quick nap.

320288.「ちっ……門番が変わっちまった時から\n 予想はしていたが……神殿の中も\n 以:
I had expected this since the gatekeeper has
changed, but... the inside of the temple is
not the same as it was before.

320289.「とりあえず 手探りで進んでみるしかないか。\n まずは そーっと いっぽ……:
I guess we'll just have to go on with our
groping for now. First, we should gently take
a step...

320291.「うえええぇっ！？\n つ ついに 金色のニワトリが\n 出てきちゃったよ！？:
Eeeeeeeeee! Finally, a golden Chicken has
appeared!

320293.「その暗闇に トサカの先 ちょっとでも\n 触れてみろッ！ ヒトの子である お前:
Touch even the tip of your tosakka to that darkness, Miro! You, human children, will be dragged into a nightmare from which you will
never return!

320294.「ああ……？\n お前の その偉そうなしゃべり方\n どっかで聞いた覚えが ある:
Oh...? I remember hearing you talking like
that somewhere. Alto, I was thinking...

320295.「もしかして 神殿の入り口で\n オレたちを試した あの門番ニワトリの本体か？:
Could it be the main body of Chicken, the
gatekeeper who tested us at the entrance to
the temple?

320296.「ええいッ！ 頭が高い！\n ただのニワトリと思ったら 大間違いだッ！:
Yeaaaah! The head is high! If you think it's
just a Chicken, you're wrong!

320297.「吾輩は 偉大なる守護天使様の \n 最も忠実にして 優秀なるしもべ！\n 暁の:
I am the most faithful and excellent servant
of the great protection angel! I am the
messenger of the dawn, Master Kokken!

320298.「ええっ？ コッケン様！？\n それって もしかして コッケン祭りの\n あの:
Eh? Master Kokken? Does that mean the Master
Kokken from the Kokken Festival?

320299.「うむ いかにも そのコッケンなり！\n 吾輩は メネトの守護者として ご主人様:
Yes, indeed, I am that cockamamie! As the
Sentinel of Menet, I was entrusted by the
master to guard the gate of the temple!

320300.「だが……このコッケン 一生の不覚ッ！\n 外からの守りにばかり 徹しておったら:
But...this Kokken...this is a lifelong mistake! If you were only defending from the outside, the enemy was hiding in the inside of
the temple...

320301.「おかげで 聖なる神殿は この有様！\n 吾輩は なんとしても 悪しき者に囚われ:
Thanks to this, the holy temple is in this state! I must do everything in my power to save the master from being captured by the
evil one...

320302.「悲しいかな 吾輩ひとりでは 不可能ッ！\n だからこそ 吾輩は 入り口でお前ら:
Sadly, it is impossible for me to do it alone!
That's why I judged whether you are worthy to
believe in me at the entrance!

320303.「吾輩は お前らを 信じることにした！\n 特に そこの マヌケ面の お前ッ！\:
I have decided to believe in you! Especially
you, you stupid face! I can feel the
vibrations of unparalleled goodness from you!

320304.「あはは！ よかったね <pc>。\n 新たなファン 獲得だよ！:
Haha! Good for you <pc>. You've got
a new Fan!

320305.「しかし 愚か！ あまりにも愚かじゃッ！\n 悪しき者相手に 無策で突っ込むなど:
But stupidity! Too foolish! If it weren't for
me, you would have been annihilated in no time
at all!

320306.「だが 喜ぶがいい！ ご主人様のもとまで\n 吾輩が チカラを貸してやろうではな:
But rejoice! I will lend you my help to reach
the master! An honor more than enough for you
human children!

320307.「それが モノを頼む 態度かよ？\n 要は お前も ヘマこいたから\n 神殿が:
That's the attitude to ask for things? The
point is, you screwed up too, and this is what
happened to TEMPLE, right?

320308.「どうも 信用できねえなぁ。\n こいつ 本当に 役に立つのか？\n うるさいだ:
I don't trust him. Is this guy really useful?
If he's just a loudmouth, I'll pluck his tail
feathers.

320309.「無礼者！ なんじゃ そのクチのききかたは！\n お前こそ 魚のようなヒレを つ:
Rude! How dare you listen to MOUTH? You are
more peculiar than I am with your fins like a
fish!

320311.「まあいい！ ならば吾輩のチカラ\n とくと 見ておるがいい！\n コホン……。: Oh well! Then see what I can do!

320313.「わあ すごい！\n コケちゃんの鳴き声で 眠っていた柱が起きて\n 明かりが:
Wow, that's great! The sound of Moke-chan's
cry woke up the sleeping pillars, and the
light came on!

320314.「それに……明かりが ともったおかげで\n 通路の暗闇が晴れて 歩いても 大丈夫:
And... the light has cleared the darkness of
the Passage, so it looks like it's safe to
walk around!

320315.「ただの柱ではないぞ。こやつらも\n 立派な この神殿の眷属どもじゃ。:
They are not just pillars. They are also the
dependents of the "Temple of".

320316.「本来ならば 神殿の廊下を照らし\n 警護しているはずが 悪しき者に襲われ\n:
The temple's corridors should have been lit
and guarded, but the evil one attacked them
and they are all asleep.

320317.「ご主人様は 神殿のいちばん奥に\n 囚われておる。そこまで 吾輩の鳴き声で\n:
The master is trapped in the deepest part of
the temple. You must wake the pillars with my
cries and advance to that point.

320318.「眠っている柱の前に 吾輩を連れていくがいい！\n 日の出のごとき 強烈な鳴き声:
Take me before the sleeping pillar! I will wake them up with a mighty cry like the rising of the sun, and I will illuminate the
darkness!

320319.「それでは ご主人様のもとへ！\n いざ 出発進行じゃ！！: Let's go to the master! Let's get going!

320323.「誰が そんな場所に閉じ込めたの！？\n そこから すぐ 出してあげるからね！:
Who would lock you in a place like that? I'll
get you out of there right away!

320325.「こっちに 来ちゃだめだ！\n すぐに逃げて！ あいつが……:
Don't come over here! Get out of here now!
He's...

320327.「せっかく 気持ちよく寝てたのに\n 起きちまったじゃねえかあ……。:
I was sleeping comfortably, but now I've woken
up...

320328.「ん～～～～？\n なんだあ お前ら～？: Hmm ~~~~? What is it, you guys~?

320329.「ふわ～ああ……。\n ぬし様に 見張りを頼まれたけどよぉ……\n おりゃ～退屈:
I was asked by Master Nushi to keep an eye on
things, but... Master asked me to watch over
you, but I was so bored that I fell asleep.

320330.「逃げてなくて よかったぁ。\n イイ子で そこに入ってろよぉ？:
I'm glad you didn't run away. Be a good boy
and stay in there, okay?

320332.「許せない！\n あんたが トープスを 閉じ込めてたのね！:
Unforgivable! You were the one who locked
Tohpes up!

320333.「ああ～ん？\n お前……見覚えがあるぞぉ？\n メネト村で 花に囲まれてたヤツ:
Ah~hmm? You look familiar, the guy surrounded
by flowers at Menet Village?

320335.「ヒヒヒ……。\n 眠ってる時は けっこう かわいかったけどよぉ\n しゃべると:
Hee-hee... He was quite cute when he was
sleeping, but when he talks, he's so cheeky...

320336.「やっぱ ぬし様の言うとおりだなぁ～。\n 人間どもは 悪夢に苦しんでる時のが\:
I guess Nushi-sama is right...humans are much
better when they are suffering from
nightmares.

320337.「ちっ……胸糞悪い野郎だ。\n おい ふたりとも オレの後ろに隠れてろ。:
Damn... he's disgusting. Hey, you two, get
behind me.

320338.「おりゃ あくむにゅうどうってんだ。\n お前らに もう一度 最悪の悪夢を\n:
I am the Nightmare Priest. I'm going to give
you the worst nightmare once again!

320339.「そうは させんわい！！\n コケコッコーーーーーー！！: I won't let that happen! Cock-a-doodle-doo!

320341.「ああ～！ びっくりした……。\n そうか お前がいたっけなぁ……。:
Ahh~! I was so surprised... Oh well, there you
are...

320342.「せっかく 悪夢を見せても\n お前がいると すぐに\n 目覚めさせちまうんだっ:
Even if I gave them nightmares, I would have
woken them up as soon as you were there.

320343.「しゃーねぇなぁ～。\n めんどくさいけど お前ら全員\n 殺すしか なさそうだ:
What the hell~! It's a pain in the ass, but I
guess I'll have to kill you all.

320345.「吾輩が チカラを貸せるのは ここまで！\n あの不届き者を ぶちのめして\n:
This is as far as I can go! I can only help
you so far! I must beat that traitor to death
and save Master-sama!

320346.「ここは 僕が 戦うから\n ヒューザは ふたりを頼んだよ。\n それじゃ いこ:
I'll fight here, so Hyuza asked me to take
care of the two of you. Let's go then
<cs_pchero>!

320347.「お前ら めっちゃ つよいのなぁ……。\n あとは……ぬし様 頼みますわぁ……。:
You guys are so strong... Now all that's left
to do is....

320349.「ティセ……来てくれて ありがとう。 \n 俺のチカラだけじゃ どうしても\n:
Tise...thank you for coming. I just couldn't
get out of there on my own.

320350.「ご主人様……ご無事でなによりです！\n 神殿の中が 突如 悪夢に侵略された時は:
Master...I'm so glad you are safe and sound!
When the temple was suddenly invaded by a
nightmare, it was truly chilling!

320351.「ですが……ご主人様。\n まるで ただの人間のような\n そのお姿は いったい:
But...master-sama. What is that human-like
figure...?

320352.「見ての通りだよ。もう 俺には\n 悪夢に対抗するチカラなど 残っていない。\n:
As you can see. I no longer have the strength
left to fight the nightmare. So I guess I
can't go back to the way I was.

320353.「もとの姿……？ どういうこと？: Original form...? What do you mean?

320354.「混乱させてごめんね。ティセ。\n 俺は メネト村の守護天使 トープス。\n メ:
Sorry for the confusion Tise, I am the
protection angel Tohpes of Menet Village and
it was me who put Menet Village to sleep.

320355.「やっぱり……君が 守護天使だったんだね。: I knew it...you were the protection angel.

320356.「うん……。はるか昔 俺たち守護天使は\n 滅びゆくゼニアスから 自らの守護する:
Yeah... A long time ago, we protection angels
tried to protect our own protection people
from the dying Zeniath by our own means.

320357.「俺は メネト村のみんなを いつか\n 救いが訪れる時まで 眠らせることにした。:
I have decided to let everyone in Menet Village sleep until salvation comes one day. As long as they keep sleeping, they'll never
get old.

320358.「しばらくは それでよかったんだ。\n でも メネトのみんなが 悪夢を見るように:
That was fine for a while. But things changed
when everyone at Menet started having
nightmares.

320359.「この地に ジア・クトが襲ってきた時の\n 恐怖の記憶が みんなの心を蝕んで\n:
The memory of the horror of Dia Kut's attack
on this place has consumed everyone's mind and
has gradually become a nightmare.

320360.「そして 長い年月の間……皆の夢の中で\n くり返された悪夢は やがて 実体を得:
And over the years... the nightmares that
replayed in everyone's dreams eventually took
on substance and began to walk on their own.

320361.「俺は 何度も その悪夢を消し去ったけど\n 悪夢は よみがえって 村のみんなを:
I tried many times to make the nightmare go away, but it came back and attacked everyone in the village. But in time, I myself became
worn out...

320362.「最後は仕方なく 自分と一緒に 悪夢を\n そこの棺桶に封印し 眠りについたんだ:
In the end, I had no choice but to seal the nightmare in the coffin there with myself and go to sleep. Then my nightmares invaded me
too.

320363.「以前 眠ったメネト村で 君たちと出会った\n 無力な俺は 守護天使の俺が見てい:
I met you guys before, in a sleepy Menet Village, where I was helpless, and the dreams I was having as a protection angel were the
ones I was wandering around in.

320364.「なるほど……だから 以前の君は\n 棺桶の中の君が 目覚めることによって\n:
I see...so the old you suddenly disappeared
when you woke up in the coffin.

320365.「じゃあ メネト村のみんなを 黒い影にしたのは\n キミと一緒に 棺桶で眠ってい:
So the black shadow of everyone in Menet Village is the nightmare that you and I were supposed to be sleeping in a coffin
together...?

320366.「ああ。メネトの悪夢は 皆が 悪夢を見るたび\n 強大になっていった……。今では:
Yeah, the Nightmare of Menet has become more powerful with every nightmare everyone has. Now it's too much for my depleted strength to
handle.

320367.「ごめんよ ティセ。\n すべての元凶は……この俺だ。: Sorry Tise, it all started with me.

320368.「だから 俺は 自分のせいで生まれてしまった\n メネトの悪夢を 倒さなきゃいけ:
That's why I have to defeat the Nightmare of
Menet, which was born because of me. That is
the only way I can atone for my sins...

320369.「なのに……俺には もう\n 守護天使のチカラが 残っていない……。\n 今の俺:
And yet...I no longer have the power of a
protection angel left in me... I'm just a
helpless kid now...

320371.「チカラなら ここにあるじゃない！\n ティセちゃんの 花冠に！！:
If it's power, it's right here in Tise-chan's
flower crown!

320373.「あたし ずっと不思議に思ってたの。\n メネト村が悪夢に襲われた時 どうして\:
I've always wondered how Tise-chan was the
only one who survived when Menet Village had
the nightmare.

320374.「その花冠の おかげだったんだよ！\n だって それから すっごく強い\n 創生:
It was because of that flower crown! Because
since then, I've felt a very strong power of
creation.

320375.「夢の中でも ティセさんを 守ろうと\n チカラを込めて花冠を 作ったのだろうね:
Even in his dream, he must have put all his energy into making a crown to protect Tise- san. If that is the case, then I should return
the crown to Mr. Tohpes...

320376.「わかった！\n この花冠 大好きだったけど あなたに返すよ。\n 受け取って…:
I understand! I loved this flower crown, but
I'm giving it back to you. Take it...tohpes!

320378.「そのお姿を拝見するのは 何万年ぶりですかな。\n よくぞ……よくぞ お戻りにな:
It has been tens of thousands of years since I
have seen you. Welcome back, protection angel
Tohpes.

320379.「ティセや ポルテ……みんなのおかげで\n 俺はやっと 守護天使に 戻ることがで:
Tise, Porte... thanks to all of you I can
finally be a protection angel again. Thank you
so much.

320381.「あれほど濃かった闇が 一気に晴れた……。\n さすがは 守護天使様といった感じ:
The darkness that was so thick has cleared up
in a flash... As one would expect from a
protection angel.

320382.「これで この神殿は もう安全だよ。\n さて 次は メネト村のみんなを\n 助:
The Temple of is now safe. Now we have to go
save everyone in Menet Village.

320383.「いでよ！ 悪夢への夢路よ！: Come on! It's a dream road to a nightmare!

320384.「メネト村の皆が 囚われている悪夢の世界へ\n 道をつないだよ。ここから メネト:
We have connected the way to the World of Nightmares, where everyone in Menet Village is trapped. From here, we'll have our final
showdown with the Nightmare of Menet.

320385.「吾輩がお供できるのは ここまでです。\n この神殿を 守護しなければなりません:
I can only accompany you so far. I have to
protect this Temple of. I wish you good luck!
Mr. Tohpes!

320386.「<cs_pchero>！ これは夢だ！\n 取り込まれちゃいけない！！:
<cs_pchero>! This is a dream! Don't be
taken in!

320388.「はあっ はあっ……。\n い 今のは……！？: Ah, ah, ah...! What was that...!

320389.「ちっ……最悪なモン 見せやがって……。: Damn...you showed me the worst thing...

320390.「クックック…………！\n 私の悪夢は 現実と区別がつかないのが\n ウリなんで:
Cookeck...! My nightmares are
indistinguishable from reality...

320391.「この広場に入ってきた時から あなたたちはもう\n 私の悪夢に 取り込まれていた:
From the moment you entered this plaza, you
were already part of my nightmare.

320392.「さあ今は 現実？ それとも夢かな？\n あなたたちは本当に 目覚めていると思う:
Now is it real? Or am I dreaming? Do you
really think you're awake?

320393.「お前の悪夢には 屈しない！\n 何度だって 皆を救い出してみせる！:
I will not succumb to your nightmares! I will
rescue you all again and again!

320394.「ふふふ……。\n 久しぶりですね トープス。\n 天使の姿でのお目見えは いつ:
Hmmm... It's been a while since we last saw
you in your angelic form, Tohpes.

320395.「あなたが メネト村を眠らせてくれたおかげで\n この私が 生まれたわけですが…:
You put Menet Village to sleep, and that's how
I came into being, but now it's time for me to
be free to Spear.

320396.「私は 気づいたんです。\n このゼニアス全土が 我が悪夢に沈めば\n 私を邪魔:
I realized that if all of Zeniath was submerged in my nightmare, there would be no one left to stand in my way! Once all of
Zeniath was submerged in my nightmare, there would be no one left to stand in my way!

320397.「お前との付き合いも 長くなったけれど……\n もう いいかげん ウンザリだよ。:
We've known each other for a long time, but
I've had enough of you. Let's settle this
here.

320398.「笑わせてくれますね。この何万年かの間\n メネトの住人が どれほど くり返し\:
You make me laugh. How many recurring nightmares do you think the inhabitants of Menet have had over the last tens of thousands
of years?

320399.「そのたびに 私は チカラを増し……\n 今や 私の方が はるかに強大なんですよ:
Each time I grow more powerful... and now I am
much more powerful! I will drag you into my
nightmares again and again!

320401.「トープスくん！ 僕も手伝うよ！\n あいつの悪夢から <cs_pchero>た:
Mr. Tohpes! I'm here to help! Let's protect
<cs_pchero> and the others from his
nightmare!

320402.「んじゃ 今度は オレの出番だな。\n 思いっきり 暴れてやるぜ。:
Well, now it's my turn. I'm going to go all
out.

320403.「クックック……いいでしょう！ \n 死んだ方が はるかにマシだったと思うような:
Cookek... fine! You'll have a nightmare so bad
you'll wish you were dead!

320404.「ククク……。\n これで……終わりだと\n 思わないでくださいね……。:
Kuku Kuku... Please don't think this...is the
end...

320405.「人々の心に刻まれた 恐怖の記憶がある限り……\n 私は……何度でも よみがえる:
As long as there are memories of the horror
etched in people's minds I can come back again
and again...

320407.「その時は……\n 何度だって 俺が消してやるさ。: When that happens I'll make it go away.

320409.「ティセ！ よかった……。\n もう 全部終わったから 安心していいよ。\n メ:
Tise! I'm sure everyone in Menet Village is
back to normal now that everything is over.

320410.「へへっ……なんだか 天使のトープスって\n 大人っぽくて 変な感じ！:
Hehehe...kinda weird how angel tohpes are so
grown up!

320411.「さあ早く 本当のメネト村に 帰ろうよ！\n きっと 天使のトープスを見たら\n:
Come on, let's go back to the real Menet
Village! I bet everyone will be so excited
when they see the angelic Tohpes!

320412.「ティセ……ごめん。\n 俺はもう 村には戻らない方が いいと思う。:
Tise...sorry. I don't think I should go back
to the village.

320414.「だって……俺が 村を眠らせていた元凶だった。\n それどころか 悪夢を生み出し:
Because...I was the one who kept the village awake. In fact, I was the one who created the nightmares and caused everyone pain for so
long.

320415.「申し訳なくて……とても村には 帰れない。: I'm so sorry...I can't go back to the village.

320416.「そんな……夢の中で 約束したじゃない！\n 一緒に コッケン祭りに行こうって！:
Oh no...you promised in the dream! We promised to go to the Cocken Festival together! Everyone is definitely waiting for Tohpes'
return!

320417.「トープス！ ね！ 一緒に帰ろう？: Tohpes! Hey! You wanna come home with me?

320420.「俺は！ いつか ティセたちに\n 豊かな世界で 生きてほしかったから\n 皆を:
I..! I decided to put everyone to sleep
because I wanted Tise and her friends to live
in a prosperous world someday!

320421.「目覚めてしまったら……みんな トシも取る。\n この救いなき大地で 一生を終え:
When you wake up... you will all be old. We'll
spend the rest of our lives in this land of no
help. All of this... it was meaningless...

320423.「ばかトープス！ 天使に戻っても\n 相変わらず ウジウジしてんのね！:
Even though you've returned to the angels,
you're still as stubborn as ever!

320424.「あんたこそ いい加減 目を覚ましなさいよ！: You should be the one to wake up!

320426.「あんたが 村を眠らせたのは\n みんなを 守るためだったんでしょ？\n そんな:
You put the village to sleep to protect
everyone, didn't you? If I explain it to them,
they'll understand!

320427.「それに たとえ 私たちを守るためでも……\n 眠りつづけてるのって 退屈だった:
Besides, even if it was to protect us... it
was boring to stay asleep. It's much more fun
when you wake up!

320428.「このまま メネト村で 一生過ごすことの\n どこが悪いの？ 私は メネト村が大:
What's wrong with spending the rest of your life in Menet Village? I love Menet Village. I am sure everyone in the village feels the same
way.

320430.「うん！ 余計なこと言うやつがいたら\n 私が そいつを とっちめてやるから！:
Yes, I'll do it! If anyone says anything out
of line, I'll take him to task!

320431.「あはは……さすが ティセだ。\n 眠ってるときからずっと ティセは\n 俺の:
Ha-ha-ha...that's Tise for you. Ever since I
was sleeping, Tise has been my best friend.

320432.「そうよ！ だから 安心して。\n 一緒に メネト村に帰って\n コッケン祭りを:
That's right! So don't worry. Let's go back to
Menet Village and enjoy the Cocken Festival
together!

320433.「……ねえ トーくん。\n キミは メネト村を眠らせたことに\n 意味がなかった:
You said that putting Menet Village to sleep
didn't make sense.

320434.「キミが みんなを 眠らせていてくれたからこそ\n あたしたちと 出会うことがで:
It's because YOU kept everyone awake that we
were able to meet. I would never say that it
was meaningless!

320436.「ふふっ どういたしまして！ \n それじゃ みんなで一緒に\n メネト村に 帰:
You're Welcome! Well then, let's all go back
to Menet Village together!

320437.<pc>たちが メネト村に帰ると\n村の住人は すっかり もとに戻っていた！:
When the <pc> returned to Menet
Village, the inhabitants had completely
returned to normal!

320438.そして 村じゅう大急ぎで\nコッケン祭りの準備が 進められ……:
And the whole village is rushing to prepare
for the Cocken Festival...

320439.ついに ヤドリギ広場にて\nコッケン祭り 当日となった！:
Finally, it was the day of the Cocken Festival
at Mistletoe Plaza!

320440.「いやはや まさか今年のコッケン祭りには\n 本物のコッケン様が いらしてくださ:
I never thought that the real Mr. Cocken would
be at this year's Cocken Festival! What a
great honor!

320441.「祭りの準備 ご苦労だった！ メネトの村人よ！\n 吾輩が来たからには メネトの:
Thank you for your hard work in preparing for the festival! Villager of Menet! Now that I am here, Menet's bountiful harvest is as good as
guaranteed!

320443.「うぉっほん！ では！ コッケン様の\n 聖なる鳴き声にて コッケン祭りの開始と:
Woo hoo! Well then! Let the Cocken Festival
begin with Master Cocken's holy cry! Please,
Master Cocken, let's do it!

320446.「いざ コッケン祭りの はじまりじゃ！\n 皆の者 思う存分 食べて飲んで\n:
It's time for the Cocken Festival to begin!
Let's eat, drink, and enjoy to the fullest!

320447.「はわーー。コケちゃんって 本当に\n コッケン祭りの コッケン様だったんだね。:
Wow. Koke-chan really was the Lady Kocken of
the Kocken Festival, wasn't she?

320448.「コッケンは ずっと昔から 太陽の使いとして\n 守護天使と同じくらい……いや:
Cockens have long been worshipped in Menet
Village as much as, if not more than,
protection angels, as messengers of the sun.

320449.「とはいえ 本物が コッケン祭りに参加するのは\n これまでの歴史でも 前代未聞:
Though, it would be unprecedented in the
history of the festival for the real thing to
take part in the Cocken Festival.

320450.「そういえば 気になっていたんだけど\n <pc>たちは 俺が 守護天使だって\:
Speaking of which, I was wondering if
<pc> and the others had guessed that
I was a protection angel.

320451.「もしかして 誰かから守護天使の話を\n 聞いたのかな？:
Perhaps someone told you about the PROTECTION
angels?

320452.<pc>は 守護天使マギエルに言われて\nゼニアスの各地にいる 守護天使を\n捜:
explained that he was looking for protection angels in various parts of Zeniath at the behest of protection angel
Magiel!

320453.「そうか……マギエル様が……。\n ならば 近いうちに \n 招集があるかもしれ:
I see....Mr. Magiel is... Then there may be a
call for a meeting in the near future...

320454.「<pc> これを渡しておくよ。 \n マギエル様から ３つの神器を集めるように:
<pc> I'll give you this. Magiel will
ask you to collect the three sacred objects.

320456.「<pc>には 本当に助けてもらったから\n 今度は 俺が恩返しをする番だ。\n:
<pc> really helped me out, so now
it's my turn to return the favor. If you need
anything at all, I'll be there for you.

320457.「おうおう……ここに集まっておったのか。\n 捜したぞい お前さんたち。:
Oh, oh... here you are gathered. We've been
looking for you, boys.

320458.「またしても お前さんたちに村を救われたでな！\n たんまり 礼をさせてもらいた:
Once again, you have saved our village! I
wanted to thank you in full! Please accept
this!

320459.「いやはや トープス！\n まさか あのやんちゃな お前さんが\n 守護天使様だ:
I had no idea that you, that mischievous boy,
were a protection angel!

320460.「どうりで 夢を見ていた時でも ずっと\n お前さんが そばにいてくれたわけだな:
No wonder you were by my side all the time,
even when I was dreaming. I am truly grateful
to the angels.

320461.「やめてよ ロナじいさん！\n 今まで通り ただのトープスで いいってば！:
Stop it, Grandpa Rona! I'm just Tohpes, like
I've always been!

320462.「んむう……そうかあ？\n お前さんが そうしてほしいなら……: Hmmm... is that so? If that's what you want...

320463.「トープス！ それにみんなも！\n コッケン音頭が 始まるよーー！:
Tohpes! And everyone else! The Cocken Ondo is
about to start!

320464.「そんな端っこで 話してないで\n ヤドリギの方に来て みんなで踊ろうよ！:
Don't talk on the edge like that, come over to
Mistletoe and let's dance together!

320465.「楽しそう～！ やるやる！\n ほら バルくんも ヒューくんも行こ！:
Sounds fun~! Let's do it! Come on, Asby and
Hyuzie, let's go!

320466.「ふふっ！ よろこんで！\n ゼクレスの舞踏会では よく踊っていたけど\n みん:
I used to dance at the Zechres Ball, but this is my first time dancing in a circle! I used to dance at the Zechres Ball, but this is my
first time dancing in a circle with everyone!

320467.「あーーいや。\n オレは そういうのはパスするぜ。: Oh, no. I'll pass on that.

320468.「おい お前！ 吾輩をたたえる踊りに\n 参加しないとは 何事じゃ！\n 問答無:
Hey, you! What is the matter with you that you won't participate in the dance to honor me? You're forced to participate, no questions
asked!

320469.「お前が 踊る気になるまで\n 離れんぞ！ さあ 踊るのじゃ！:
I'm not leaving until you're ready to dance!
Come on, dance!

320470.「いてっ！ おい突っつくな！\n わかった！ わかったよ！:
Ouch! Hey, stop poking me! All right, all
right! All right, all right!

320471.<pc>たちは コッケン音頭を\n踊って 楽しい時を過ごした。:
The <pc> had a great time dancing
the Cocken Ondo.

320472.メネト村の人々は 守護天使のトープスを\nあたたかく迎え 村人はみな\n久々のコ:
The people of Menet Village warmly welcomed the protection angel, Tohpes, and the villagers all truly enjoyed the Cocken
Festival after a long absence...

320473.コッケン祭りは 夜通し続き……\n……そして 夜が明けた！<me 64>:
The Cocken Festival continued through the
night ... and into the dawn!<me 64>

320474.残りの守護天使を 目覚めさせるため\nほかの町へ 向かおう。:
Head to another town to awaken the remaining
Guardian Angels.

320475.これで ３人の守護天使を 目覚めさせた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろう。:
Now that the three Guardian Angels have been
awakened, head back to the Land of
Beginnings.

321824.「ママが……村のみんなが……！\n ま……ま……真っ黒な影に……:
My mom... everyone in the village..! I'm...
in... the... blackest... shadow...

321825.「おい 見にいくぞ。: Hey, I'm going to take a look.

321826.<pc>は ティセを落ち着かせ\n一緒に 宿屋の外に 向かった！:
<pc> calmed Tise down and together
they headed out of the inn!

321828.「みんな やっと太陽が昇って……\n はりきって コッケン祭りの準備を\n して:
The sun had finally risen and everyone was
getting ready for the Cocken Festival...

321829.「どうして またこんな\n ひどいことが 起きちゃうのよ……。: Why is this terrible thing happening again?

321830.「村の北側を見回ってみたが 全滅だな。\n アスバル そっちは どうだった？:
I looked around the north side of the village,
but it's all gone.

321831.「こっちも ダメだった。\n 村人どころか 動物たちも全部\n 黒い影になってい:
It was no good here either, not only the
villager, but all the animals were in black
shadows.

321834.「昨日 ママに 村の外に行く許可をもらって……\n それで 早起きして 準備して:
Yesterday, my mom gave me permission to go
outside the village... so I woke up early and
got ready...

321835.「そ……そしたら……ママとパパが\n 急に 何かを すごく怖がりはじめて……:
And then... and then... my mom and dad
suddenly got really scared about something.

321836.「い……いきなり 黒い霧みたいのに \n 包まれて……それっきり\n 動かなくな:
Suddenly I was enveloped in a black mist...and
I never moved again...

321837.「それで……怖くなって家の外に出たら\n 村のみんなも……。:
So...I got scared and went outside my house
and everyone in the village...

321838.「そうだったんだ……。\n ティセちゃんだけでも 無事でよかった。:
Oh, that's right...I'm glad Tise-chan at least
is safe.

321839.「また……夜が明けなくなってしまったね。\n 今は 本来ならもう\n 朝日が昇っ:
It's not dawn again. It should be sunrise by
now.

321840.「やっぱり……消えたトープスくんのことといい\n 神殿のフクロウを 倒しただけじ:
As I thought...the disappearance of Tohpes-kun
and the defeat of the temple owl did not solve
the problem in this village.

321841.「村にとどまっているのも 危ないかもしれない。\n 急いで 宵の神殿に向かおう。:
Staying in the village may not be safe. Let's
hurry to the Temple of Twilight.

324972.<cs_pchero>たちは 悪夢の世界を後にし\n現実のラランブラ山道へ 戻っ:
<cs_pchero> and his group left the World of
Nightmares and returned to the real Larambla
Mountain Pass!
